revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Radxa |model=E25 |revision=(D2E8) V1.4 |asin=B0BNT3213G |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=60 |est_release_date=11/2022 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2-4 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3568 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Foresee |fla1_model=KREC4A1MA1A2C1 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9HCNNNBKMML-HRNME |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, NGFF (M.2), USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, console,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8125B |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8125B |lan_speed=2.5GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=2.5GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB to Serial Interface;WCH;CH340B;;1;,,, Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK809-5;;1;,,, 10-output Differential Ultra Low Jitter Buffer;Aura Semi;AU5411;;1;,,, 4-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, Low Capacitance ESD TVS Array;Createk;CESD2510LC5VU-M;;1;,,, 18V 5A Synchro Step-Down DC/DC Converter;SCT;SCT2250;;1;,,, <!--Silicon Content Tech--> 5A Synchro Step-Down DC-DC Converter;Tctek;TCS4525;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchro Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089A;;6;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;2; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, SIM Card slot, I2C, I2S, SPI, ADC, PWM, CAN Bus, UART, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.09;;g26d3b6963ed-211223; |stock_os=Linux;4.19.193;Debian 11; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=rock |default_pass=rock |oui_eth=00:E0:4C }} {{TagLine|Networking Single-board Computer}} :[https://rock.sh/starte25 Product page]
"Rock Pi Compute Module 3 Plus V1.2" and "20220520" are :silkscreened on [[Rock Pi CM3+ (D2E8)]] [https://wiki.radxa.com/Rock3/CM3 SoM module]. "Radxa E.25 V1.4" is silkscreened on top of carrier board. {{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3568 @2.0GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, :TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4X) SDRAM *Network: 2x 2.5GbE ports *Expansion: 1x Mini PCIe w/ SDIO, :1x NGFF M.2 (Key B) socket *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: USB (Type-C) 5V only
===Links=== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/radxa-e25-and-e23-boards-deliver-rk3568-or-rk3566-with-up-to-dual-2-5gbe/ ''Radxa E25 and E23 boards'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/11/21/radxa-e25-modular-2-5gbe-router-supports-wifi-6-and-4g-5g-cellular-connectivity/ ''Radxa E25 modular 2.5GbE router'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/radxa-e25-is-a-tiny-networking-device-with-dual-2-5-gbps-ethernet-ports-and-an-ark3568-processor/ ''Radxa E25 is a tiny networking device'' on '''Liliputing''']
==Images== <gallery> File:Radxa E25.jpeg|External view File:Radxa E25 Top.jpeg|Board top File:Radxa E25 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom File:Radxa E25 Bottom w-SOM.jpeg|Board bottom w/ SoM File:Rock_Pi_CM3+_(D2E8)_Top.jpeg|SoM top File:Rock_Pi_CM3+_(D2E8)_Bottom.jpeg|SoM bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
